description: Lazmiiiâ€¢) Ap yeh Box soch samajh kar fill karna Q k ap phir inko WhatsApp per change nahi kar pae ge Ok

PREFIX.description: Apne bot ke prefix ke lie koi bhy symbol daalo jese . , ! ? Sirf ek symbol likho

AUTO_READ_MESSAGES.description: Agar ap chahte hai ke apka bot apke contacts ke msgs seen kare to |yes| Likho agar nahi chahte to |no| Likho

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Agar ap chahte hai apka bot apke contacts ke statues Auto Seen kare to Likho |yes| Agar chahte ho ke Auto Seen Naa kre to |no| Likho

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Agar ap chahte hai apka bot apke friends ke status Save ker ke apke inbox me send kre to Likho |yes| Agar Chahte ho Ke Send Naa kare to Likho |no|

PM_PERMIT.description: Agar ap chahte ho ke apke inbox me har koi apka bot use kare to Likho |no| Agar Nahi chahte to Likho |no|

BOT_NAME.description: Ap apne bot ka name Likho

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: Bot ke menu ki pic ka Link Likho

PUBLIC_MODE.description: Agar ap chahte hai apka bot har koi use kare to likho |yes| agar ap khud use karna chahte hai to Likho |no| Is se koi bhi apka bot use nahi kar pae ga

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Apke heroku ke accounts ki API KEY Likho

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Jo ap ne oper 1st me name likha hai wo copy ker ke yaha paste karo

SESSION_ID.description: Bot ki session id jo apko whatsapp per mili wo yaha likhe

OWNER_NUMBER.desc: Ap apna number likho |+| nahi lagana ese likho 923xxxxx

WARN_COUNT.desc: Ap kisi ko kitny warnins dena chahte hai phir jese hy yeh warnings poori hogi wo banda block ho jae ga ya group me hai to remove ho jae ga

CHAT_BOT.desc: Ap apne msg ko mention ker ke kuch bhi likho ge to reply ae ga uske lie |yes| Likho agar chahte hai ke reply Naa ae to |no| Likho

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: Apke inbox me bot ka connected msg ata hai agar ap chahte ho yeh msg ae to |yes| Likho agar chahte ho ke msg Naa ae to |no| Likho

PRESENCE.description: Yaha per |online| Likho always Online Show hone ke lie or |typing| likho ge to koi msg kre ga apko oper show hoga is typing...  or chahte ho ke is recordin...  show ho to uske lie |recording| Likho or agar chahte hai esa kuch bhi na ho to box khali chor do
